column2:
EMF works toward a fun, varied, strategic, challenging, balanced, customizable, and, most importantly, more coherent and seamless CKII experience. We strive to bring dynamism to your games within a historical context derived from an accurate, comprehensive, and quality-driven approach.

Discuss history, the game, and more with us in Paradox's HIP forum. The team:

 - AnaxXiphos
 - caocao268
 - IoannesBarbarus
 - Rylock
